description: I really like the time track, and I do like this game overall. It isn't my favourite two player game by a fair margin. It is a nice relaxing affair though.

description: Love this game, easy and challenging, fun to play and fast. Very good gateway game.

title: Very smart...
description: Very smart game. It's amazingly simple to set up, understand and fun to play. The mild strategy is very clever and it is what make this game fun.

title: 2p only, 3...
description: 2p only, 30 minutes, medium light gameRosenberg. Great 2 player game. Easy to learn and plays fast. My son is a big fan of this game. We've also bought and tried Cottage Garden, but we strongly prefer this one and have traded away Cottage Garden. The short playing time and the small sized box are ideal for trips/holidays, so this one will have amply playing time.

title: Played wit...
description: Played with my wife (who normally doesn't like complicated games) and had a blast.  I like the theme and the components.  VERY simple to teach and play.  Highly recommend!

title: Do I even ...
description: Do I even need to bother with a comment? Patchwork is so popular because Patchwork is so good. The only thing that would make it better is if it had bears. What's that you say? There might be a bear-centric game along the same lines?

title: Very littl...
description: Very little to do. The race/puzzle is not compelling enough.

title: This just ...
description: This just feels like tetris the boardgame.  I love how the game just flows so well and finding the right move in order for every piece to just fit perfectly is awesome.  I love the mechanic of jumping so far for the piece you want, or in order to block you opponent from purchasing the piece they need, it just adds a whole other level of strategy in the game.

title: **** Repla...
description: **** Replace for Barenpark (multiplayer, but no economic engine like the buttons)

title: Gave away ...
description: Gave away knowing one day it will come back to my collection. Such a perfect balance of low stress but significant decision making. Now if I can just beat Emily...

title: A satisfyi...
description: A satisfying combination of tetris and tile placement alongside a very simple, yet elegant turn process of buying tiles that earn you income, but also move you spaces.

title: The fun do...
description: The fun does not last

title: Such a sim...
description: Such a simple design, with excellent execution. The game has nothing extra, nothing flashy. It's simple and it works flawlessly.

title: Tetris mee...
description: Tetris meets quilting. Wish the pieces would snap together and stay on the board better.

title: This game ...
description: This game won us over because of how simple the design is but how clever and effective it is at the same time! I something wish it was a bit more colorful like some of the alternative artwork options on the digital version. However, this game is a great way to lure non-gamers to the table!
